mutants.code:
import re

def text_subsequence_replacement(primary_text, target_subsequence, substitution_text):
    target_subsequence = re.escape(target_subsequence)
    pattern = ''.format(target_subsequence)
    primary_text = re.sub(pattern, substitution_text, primary_text)
    return primary_text
